generalfeedback.text: We put equation [startlatexinline -4\cdot  x^2-10\cdot  x-18=29\cdot  x endlatexinline] in form [startlatexinline a\cdot x^2+b\cdot x+c=0 endlatexinline].[startlatex -4\cdot  x^2-10\cdot  x-18=29\cdot  x endlatex].[startlatex -4\cdot  x^2-39\cdot  x-18=0\text{ where we have subtracted }29\cdot  x endlatex].Therefore, [startlatexinline a=-4,b=-39 \text{ and } c=-18 endlatexinline].
